{{/* Graph Component - Knowledge Graph Visualization Based on Quartz Graph.tsx Source: quartz-src/quartz/components/Graph.tsx Features: - Local Graph: Shows neighboring pages (configurable depth) - Global Graph: Shows entire site graph (full-screen overlay) - Interactive: Drag nodes, zoom, hover highlight - Responsive: Mobile and desktop support Configuration (in Site.Params.graph): - localGraph.depth: 1 (how many levels of neighbors to show) - localGraph.scale: 1.1 (initial zoom level) - localGraph.repelForce: 0.5 (node repulsion strength) - localGraph.centerForce: 0.3 (center attraction strength) - localGraph.linkDistance: 30 (distance between connected nodes) - localGraph.fontSize: 0.6 (label font size multiplier) - localGraph.opacityScale: 1 (opacity scale for zoom) - localGraph.showTags: true (show tag nodes) - localGraph.removeTags: [] (tags to hide) - localGraph.focusOnHover: false (dim non-neighbors on hover) - globalGraph.*: Same options for global graph */}} {{- $localGraph := dict "drag" true "zoom" true "depth" 1 "scale" 1.1 "repelForce" 0.5 "centerForce" 0.3 "linkDistance" 30 "fontSize" 0.6 "opacityScale" 1 "showTags" true "removeTags" (slice) "focusOnHover" false "enableRadial" false -}} {{- $globalGraph := dict "drag" true "zoom" true "depth" -1 "scale" 0.9 "repelForce" 0.5 "centerForce" 0.2 "linkDistance" 30 "fontSize" 0.6 "opacityScale" 1 "showTags" true "removeTags" (slice) "focusOnHover" true "enableRadial" true -}} {{- with .Site.Params.graph -}} {{- if .localGraph -}} {{- $localGraph = merge $localGraph .localGraph -}} {{- end -}} {{- if .globalGraph -}} {{- $globalGraph = merge $globalGraph .globalGraph -}} {{- end -}} {{- end -}}
